full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

* English: **TC- FR TEST1**
* French: **Test seulement**

## Tender Details

* **Tender Number:** WS3755360982
* **Publication Date:** November 18, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** November 17, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Tender Status:** Expired

## Procurement Information

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements

* The tender is covered by the following trade agreements:
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Contracting Entity and End User

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)

## Contact Information

* **Name:** John Charette (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** john.charette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Tender Notice URL

* The full tender notice can be found at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14669730?extsite=MTQ2Njk3MzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Additional Information

This tender announcement is for a test purpose only and is not a valid solicitation for proposals.

The rewritten entry is in proper markdown format. The key information from the original entry has been kept but rephrased to be more professionally written. I removed all unnecessary details and only included relevant information. I also used headings and subheadings to make the content more organized and easier to read.
